welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nogent-sur-Marne, a charming city known for its beautiful riverfront and quaint streets. We invite you to explore and discover the hidden gems of our city and immerse yourself in its unique atmosphere. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 4-hour time limit per session.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal for private and charter flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals and serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster connection speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
